sourceCode:
export function CodeEntityDetails({ entity, isOpen, onClose }: CodeEntityDetailsProps) { if (!entity) return null const getEntityIcon = () => { switch (entity.type) { case "component": return case "class": return case "function": return case "method": return } } const getEntityTypeBadge = () => { switch (entity.type) { case "component": return ( Component ) case "class": return ( Class ) case "function": return ( Function ) case "method": return ( Method ) } } return ( !open && onClose()}>
{getEntityIcon()} {entity.name} {getEntityTypeBadge()}

{entity.filePath}

 Code Usage Dependencies

Usage examples will appear here.

Dependencies will appear here.

 ) }

sourceCode:
export function CodeEntityDetails({ entity, isOpen, onClose }: CodeEntityDetailsProps) { if (!entity) return null const getEntityIcon = () => { switch (entity.type) { case "component": return case "class": return case "function": return case "method": return } } const getEntityTypeBadge = () => { switch (entity.type) { case "component": return ( Component ) case "class": return ( Class ) case "function": return ( Function ) case "method": return ( Method ) } } return ( !open && onClose()}>
{getEntityIcon()} {entity.name} {getEntityTypeBadge()}

{entity.filePath}

 Code Usage Dependencies

Usage examples will appear here.

Dependencies will appear here.

 ) }

methods.name: getNodeColor
methods.code:
getNodeColor = (type: CodeEntity["type"]) => {
    switch (type) {
      case "component":
        return "#8b5cf6" // violet-500
      case "class":
        return "#3b82f6" // blue-500
      case "function":
        return "#10b981" // emerald-500
      case "method":
        return "#f59e0b" // amber-500
      default:
        return "#8b5cf6" // violet-500 as default
    }
  }

props.name: label
props.description: Accessible label for this command menu. Not shown visibly.

props.name: shouldFilter
props.description:
Optionally set to `false` to turn off the automatic filtering and sorting.
If `false`, you must conditionally render valid items based on the search query yourself.

props.name: filter
props.description:
Custom filter function for whether each command menu item should matches the given search query.
It should return a number between 0 and 1, with 1 being the best match and 0 being hidden entirely.
By default, uses the `command-score` library.

props.name: value
props.description: Optional controlled state of the selected command menu item.

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Event handler called when the selected item of the menu changes.

props.name: loop
props.description: Optionally set to `true` to turn on looping around when using the arrow keys.

props.name: disablePointerSelection
props.description: Optionally set to `true` to disable selection via pointer events.

props.name: vimBindings
props.description: Set to `false` to disable ctrl+n/j/p/k shortcuts. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: heading
props.description: Optional heading to render for this group.

props.name: value
props.description: If no heading is provided, you must provide a value that is unique for this group.

props.name: forceMount
props.description: Whether this group is forcibly rendered regardless of filtering.

name: CommandItem

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether this item is currently disabled.

props.name: onSelect
props.description: Event handler for when this item is selected, either via click or keyboard selection.

props.name: value
props.description:
A unique value for this item.
If no value is provided, it will be inferred from `children` or the rendered `textContent`. If your `textContent` changes between renders, you _must_ provide a stable, unique `value`.

props.name: keywords
props.description: Optional keywords to match against when filtering.

props.name: forceMount
props.description: Whether this item is forcibly rendered regardless of filtering.
